EmailTemplate.description: Payment Reciepts VF Page, uses PaymentVF visualforce page on site default
EmailTemplate.name: Payment Reciept PDF
EmailTemplate.subject: Five Star Professional Payment Receipt
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!kugo2p__PaymentX__c.kugo2p__Contact__c},
A credit card transaction for {!kugo2p__PaymentX__c.kugo2p__Amount__c} has been processed on {!kugo2p__PaymentX__c.Order_Release_Date__c} for your order {!kugo2p__PaymentX__c.kugo2p__SalesOrder__c} placed on {!kugo2p__PaymentX__c.Order_Release_Date__c}.
View your receipt here: (Click or Copy and Paste entire link into your browser to view)
{!kugo2p__PaymentX__c.Receipt_Link__c}
Feel free to contact us if you have any questions. Once again, we appreciate your business!
Kind regards,
Accounts Receivable Five Star Professional O: (888)608-7161 | Email: billing@fivestarprofessional.com
